IP_FORMAT_WITH_RANGE_REQUIRED: A valid IP address with a range is required
FIELD_NUMBER_REQUIRED: A numeric value is required for this field
IP_WITH_NETMASK_FORMAT_REQUIRED: A valid IP address with netmask format is required
IP_FORMAT_REQUIRED: A valid IP address is required
DOMAIN_FORMAT_REQUIRED: A valid domain format is required
(IP/SUBNET)_or_(IP/RANGE)_FORMAT_REQUIRE: A valid IP with a subnet mask or range is required
PASSWORD_CHANGED_SUCCESSFULLY: Your password has been changed successfully
NOT_LOGIN_YET: User has not logged in yet
DO_YOU_WANT_TO_DELETE_THE_STAFF: Are you sure you want to delete this staff member
WELCOME_TO_THE_OCSERV_USER_MANAGEMENT_PA: Welcome to the OCServ User Management Panel
WELCOME_HELP: Let's begin by completing a few quick configuration steps to get your panel up and running
ADMIN_SETUP_HELP: Create your admin account and enter your CAPTCHA site key and secret key These are required to protect the login page from automated bots
YOU_CAN_GENERATE_YOUR_SITE_AND_SECRET_KE: You can generate your site and secret keys from
HELPS_CONTROL_RESOURCE_USAGE_AND_PREVENT: Helps control resource usage and prevent account sharing or bandwidth abuse
LIMIT_THE_NUMBER_OF_IDENTICAL_CLIENTS: Limit the Number of Identical Clients
MAX_SESSION_TIME_IN_SECONDS_BEFORE_FORCE: Maximum Session Time (in seconds) Before Forced Disconnect
THESE_SETTINGS_CONTROL_HOW_CLIENTS_RECEI: These settings control how clients receive IP addresses and resolve domain names while connected.
ADDRESS_POOL_FOR_CLIENT_IP_LEASES: Address pool for client IP leases
STATIC_IPV4_ADDRESS_TO_ASSIGN_TO_CLIENT: Static IPv4 address to assign to the client
NETBIOS_NAME_SERVERS_(WINS)_FOR_WINDOWS_: NetBIOS name servers (WINS) for Windows clients
ROUTES_PUSHED_TO_THE_CLIENT_FOR_ROUTING_: Routes pushed to the client for routing traffic
LIST_OF_NETWORKS_TO_EXCLUDE_FROM_VPN_ROU: List of networks to exclude from VPN routing
DOMAINS_TO_RESOLVE_VIA_VPN_DNS_SERVERS: Domains to resolve using VPN DNS servers
LIST_OF_ALLOWED_OR_BLOCKED_PROTOCOLS_AND: List of allowed or blocked protocols and ports
ALLOW_CLIENT_ACCESS_ONLY_TO_DEFINED_ROUT: Allow client access only to defined routes (restrict-user-to-routes)
THESE_SETTINGS_IMPROVE_STABILITY_AND_AUT: These settings improve stability and automatically manage IDLE or disconnected clients.
INTERVAL_IN_SECONDS_TO_SEND_KEEP-ALIVE_P: Interval in seconds to send keep-alive pings
DEAD_PEER_DETECTION_TIMEOUT_IN_SECONDS: Dead peer detection timeout in seconds
DPD_TIMEOUT_SPECIFICALLY_FOR_MOBILE_CLIE: DPD timeout specifically for mobile clients
TIME_IN_SECONDS_BEFORE_DISCONNECTING_IDL: Time in seconds before disconnecting idle clients
INTERVAL_IN_SECONDS_FOR_STATS_REPORTING: Interval in seconds for stats reporting
TUNNEL_INTERFACE_MTU_TO_AVOID_FRAGMENTAT: Tunnel interface MTU to avoid fragmentation
FORCE_ALL_DNS_TRAFFIC_THROUGH_THE_VPN_TU: Force all DNS traffic through the VPN tunnel (tunnel-all-dns)
DISCONNECT_CLIENT_IF_ITS_IP_CHANGES_(DEN: Disconnect client if its IP changes (deny-roaming)
ARE_YOU_SURE_YOU_WANT_TO_LOGOUT: Are you sure you want to log out
